```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
county_data_2_ <- read_excel("data/county_data (2).xls", 
    sheet = "County")
View(county_data_2_)
pop_longer <- county_data_2_ %>% 
  mutate(POP00 = case_when(POP00 == "X" ~ NA))%>%
  pivot_longer(
  cols = starts_with("POP"),
  names_to = "year",
  values_to = "population",
  values_drop_na = TRUE
))

ggplot(data = pop_longer, 
       mapping= aes(x= year, y= population)+
         geom_tile()
```
